title: THE NEW NON-VERBAL: NEW DIMENSION OF HYPNOSIS / DR. PARET COMPILATION
description:
This is a compilation of non-verbal hypnosis regressions by Dr. Marco Paret and his students on his Masterclass. The hypnotic crisis leads to a deep transformation. With these powerful techniques, taught exclusively in his school, can be achieved healing, liberation, emotional freedom and more. Dr. Paret's course is international and suitable for students of any level. Learn all of the powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
